member.name: T:GlitchedPolygons.ExtensionMethods.RSAXmlPemStringConverter.RSAXmlPemStringConverter
member.summary: Extension method class for converting string RSA keys from and to the xml/pem formats.

member.name: M:GlitchedPolygons.ExtensionMethods.RSAXmlPemStringConverter.RSAXmlPemStringConverter.XmlToPem(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the specified XML RSA key string converted to the PEM format.
member.param: The XML string containing the RSA key.

member.name: M:GlitchedPolygons.ExtensionMethods.RSAXmlPemStringConverter.RSAXmlPemStringConverter.PemToXml(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the specified RSA key (PEM string) converted to XML.
member.param: The PEM string to convert to XML.
